Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>joda-time</groupId>
  <artifactId>joda-time-hibernate</artifactId>
  <version>1.4</version>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'joda-time:joda-time-hibernate:jar:1.4'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="joda-time" name="joda-time-hibernate" rev="1.4">
  <artifact name="joda-time-hibernate" type="jar" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='joda-time', module='joda-time-hibernate', version='1.4')
)

Grails

compile 'joda-time:joda-time-hibernate:1.4'

Leiningen

[joda-time/joda-time-hibernate "1.4"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "joda-time" % "joda-time-hibernate" % "1.4"
